src:
Timnas U-19: Fakhri Husaini Panggil Fadhillah Nur
05 Nov 2019, 09:47 by Irsyan Hasyim (Kontributor), Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Pelatih Timnas U-19 Indonesia, Fakhri Husaini, mengatakan harus mencoret satu pemain sehari jelang Kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020. Pemain tersebut ialah Muhammad Fadhil Adhitya Akshah.
Menurut dia, Fadhil mengalami cedera. Namun Fakhri sudah mendapatkan penggantinya, yakni, Fadhillah Nur dari Diklat Ragunan. "Intinya semua pemain dalam keadaan sangat siap untuk pertandingan Kualifikasi AFC Cup," kata dia, usai jumpa media di Jakarta, Selasa, 5 November 2019.
Pelatih berusia 54 tahun ini menegaskan secara keseluruhan para pemain dalam keadaan fit dan siap tempur menghadapi Hongkong, Timor Leste, dan Korea Utara. "Syukur sampai persiapan terakhir dalam kondisi sehat untuk bisa bermain semaksimal mungkin," sebut Fakhri.
Timnas U-19 akan mulai berjuang di babak kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020 yang berlangsung di Stadion Madya dan Stadion Gelora Bung Karno pada 6-10 November 2019. Indonesia berada di Grup K, bersama Timor Leste, Hong Kong, dan Korea Utara.
Laga pertama, Garuda Muda akan menghadapi Timor Leste, Rabu, 6 November 2019. Di akhir kualifikasi, hanya juara grup dan empat runner-up terbaik (dari 11 grup) yang akan lolos ke putaran final di Uzbekistan.
Timnas U-19 sudah mempersiapkan diri dengan baik untuk ajang ini. Mereka melakukan rangkaian pemusatan latihan dan seleksi pemain di Bogor. Bagus Kahfi dan kawan-kawan juga telah menjalani uji coba lokal dan dua uji coba internasional melawan Timnas Cina U-19.

IRSYAN HASYIM
text:
U-19 national team: Fakhri Husaini Call Fadhillah Nur
05 Nov 2019, 09:47 by Irsyan Hasyim (Contributor), Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Indonesian U-19 national team coach, Fakhri Husaini, said that he had to cross out one player a day ahead of the 2020 UFC 19th Cup Qualifiers. The player was Muhammad Fadhil Adhitya Akshah.
According to him, Fadhil suffered an injury. But Fakhri has got a replacement, namely, Fadhillah Nur from Ragunan Education and Training Center. "The point is all the players are in a very ready condition for the AFC Cup Qualification match," he said, after a media meeting in Jakarta, Tuesday, November 5, 2019.
The 54-year-old coach insisted overall the players were in a fit and battle-ready state to face Hong Kong, East Timor and North Korea. "Thank God until the last preparations in healthy condition to be able to play as much as possible," said Fakhri.
The U-19 national team will start fighting in the AFC U-19 2020 qualifying round which takes place at Madya Stadium and Gelora Bung Karno Stadium on November 6-10, 2019. Indonesia is in Group K, along with Timor Leste, Hong Kong and North Korea.
The first match, Garuda Muda will face Timor Leste, Wednesday, November 6, 2019. At the end of the qualification, only the group winners and the four best runners-up (from 11 groups) will qualify for the finals in Uzbekistan.
U-19 national team has prepared themselves well for this event. They conducted a series of training camps and selection of players in Bogor. Bagus Kahfi and his colleagues have also undergone local trials and two international trials against the China U-19 national team.

IRSYAN HASYIM
